chapters.title: Chapter 5: A Tale of Blood
chapters.info: Harine din Togara Two Winds, p. 100—Wavemistress of Clan Shodein for ten years. She negotiated the treaty with Merana and Rafela under Nesta's authority. Her Windfinder is Shalon, her sister. Her face is handsome and unlined, but she has white streaks her straight, black hair. She wears five rings on each ear and a nose ring with medallions. According to one of Min's viewings, Harine is destined to become the Mistress of Ships of the Atha'an Miere.
